name: Pauline Hanson: Serving Fish
description:
THINGS ARE GETTING FISHY IN IPSWICH...

23/09/17 - Version 1.0: Currently only available for Mac users, Windows build coming soon.

The object of the game is to identify the patriotic Australian fish, and serve  those up to your loyal customers. This is the best Pauline Hanson Fish Frying Simulation Experience available on the market today. The game lasts approximately one minute. It might be the best minute of your day, so what are you waiting for?

A GAME BY JOE LOUIS ROBINSON

@joelouismusic
